meanings.definition: A person who chairs a meeting or committee along with another person.
meanings.sent1: The cochairman led the meeting with his colleague.
meanings.sent2: The cochairman and his partner worked together to run the committee.
meanings.sent3: The cochairman joked that they should flip a coin to decide who speaks first.
meanings.sent4: Being a cochairman is like being a captain of a ship with a co-captain by your side.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cochairman sitting at the head of the table was etched in everyone's memory.

meanings.definition: To serve as a cochairman in a leadership role.
meanings.sent1: He will cochairman the upcoming conference with his colleague.
meanings.sent2: She cochairmans various projects to ensure smooth coordination.
meanings.sent3: The team decided to cochairman the event to share responsibilities.
meanings.sent4: She cochairmans the board meetings like a true leader.
meanings.sent5: Cochairmaning the task force requires excellent communication skills and teamwork.
